writer.name: 埃内斯托·马丁内斯·布西奥 Ernesto Martínez Bucio

director.name: 埃内斯托·马丁内斯·布西奥 Ernesto Martínez Bucio

introduction: In the radio, they are talking about last night's soccer game. Due to a wrong penalty, Mexico wins the Golden Cup semifinal to Panama. Mother and son drive to the outskirts of the city. As the police officers guide them through the woods, they talk about the match; they are wondering if failing the penalty on purpose would have been an option, they remember the America Cup: arbitration failures. Meanwhile, the son searches for his brother among the dead.
